item.title: Salman-Khan-gives-Daisy-Shah-a-second-chance
item.description: It’s a rare occurrence when Salman Khan gives a second chance to someone who has turned him down. Dancer-turned-actor Daisy Shah, who plays the female lead opposite Salman in Sohail Khan’s Mental, was the lucky recipient of this favour even though she had turned down Salman’s offer to play the second female lead in Bodyguard.
item.itunes:subtitle: It’s a rare occurrence when Salman Khan gives a second chance to someone who has turned him down. Dancer-turned-actor Daisy Shah, who plays the female lead opposite Salman in Sohail Khan’s Mental, was the lucky recipient of this favour even though she had
item.itunes:summary: It’s a rare occurrence when Salman Khan gives a second chance to someone who has turned him down. Dancer-turned-actor Daisy Shah, who plays the female lead opposite Salman in Sohail Khan’s Mental, was the lucky recipient of this favour even though she had turned down Salman’s offer to play the second female lead in Bodyguard.

item.title: Karan-Johar-to-return-with-the-koffee
item.description: Karan Johar is a busy man. The filmmaker is currently busy overseeing the release of his productions, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani and Gippi, while also promoting Bombay Talkies, a compilation that celebrates 100 years of Indian cinema, for which he has shot a segment.
item.itunes:subtitle: Karan Johar is a busy man. The filmmaker is currently busy overseeing the release of his productions, Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani and Gippi, while also promoting Bombay Talkies, a compilation that celebrates 100 years of Indian cinema, for which he has shot a

item.title: Coming-soon-Shagun-TV-India-s-first-24-hour-matrimonial-channel
item.description: Shagun TV, said to be the country's first 24-hour matrimonial channel, will be launched on April 26.

item.itunes:summary: Shagun TV, said to be the country's first 24-hour matrimonial channel, will be launched on April 26.

item.title: Flash-mob-on-India-s-Dancing-Superstar
item.description: India's Dancing Superstar team surprised the three judges - Riteish Deshmukh, Geeta Kapoor and Ashley Lobo - with their sudden flash mob act on the stage.

item.title: Search-on-for-SRK-s-heroine-in-Happy-New-Year
item.description: Choreographer-director Farah Khan is yet to decide on the female lead opposite Shah Rukh Khan for her film, Happy New Year. “I’m looking for the right face and will tell you (the media) shortly when we find her,” she said recently.
item.itunes:subtitle: Choreographer-director Farah Khan is yet to decide on the female lead opposite Shah Rukh Khan for her film, Happy New Year. “I’m looking for the right face and will tell you (the media) shortly when we find her,” she said recently.
item.itunes:summary: Choreographer-director Farah Khan is yet to decide on the female lead opposite Shah Rukh Khan for her film, Happy New Year. “I’m looking for the right face and will tell you (the media) shortly when we find her,” she said recently.

item.title: First-Look-Shruti-Hassan-in-Ramaiya-Vastavaiya
item.description: The shooting for Kumar Taurani's Ramaiya Vastavaiya has begun and it's first look is out! The movie features. Shruti Haasan and newcomer Girish Jain. SEE SHRUTI HASSAN'S NEW LOOK

item.title: I-am-happy-the-trailer-s-being-liked-Saif-Ali-Khan
item.description: Actor Saif Ali Khan, who plays a zombie slayer in his upcoming production, Go Goa Gone, is happy that the film’s trailer is being liked and insists that his role in the movie is more than just a guest appearance.

item.title: No-on-screen-kisses-for-Ayushmann-Khurrana
item.description: After sharing a two-minute long liplock with his co-star Pooja Salvi in Nautanki Saala, actor Ayushmann Khurrana has apparently refused to kiss  onscreen. A source told a Mumbai tabloid that the actor’s wife was unhappy with the kissing shot
item.itunes:subtitle: After sharing a two-minute long liplock with his co-star Pooja Salvi in Nautanki Saala, actor Ayushmann Khurrana has apparently refused to kiss  onscreen. A source told a Mumbai tabloid that the actor’s wife was unhappy with the kissing shot &nb

item.title: Nawazuddin-Siddiqui-could-have-been-in-Oye-Lucky-Lucky-Oye-Dibakar-Banerjee
item.description: Nawazuddin Siddiqui had caught the attention of filmmaker Dibakar Banerjee after Black Friday and he was keen on casting him in Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye but couldn't locate the actor.
item.itunes:subtitle: Nawazuddin Siddiqui had caught the attention of filmmaker Dibakar Banerjee after Black Friday and he was keen on casting him in Oye Lucky! Lucky Oye but couldn't locate the actor.

item.title: Ghanchakkar-sets-became-home-for-Vidya-Balan
item.description: As an actor, Vidya Balan is known to go all out to immerse herself in the films that she signs. For her next release, Ghanchakkar, she’s gone a step further. She’s allowed a few of her personal items to be used in the film.
item.itunes:subtitle: As an actor, Vidya Balan is known to go all out to immerse herself in the films that she signs. For her next release, Ghanchakkar, she’s gone a step further. She’s allowed a few of her personal items to be used in the film.

item.title: Satyagraha-Not-in-real-life-says-Ajay-Devgn
item.description: Actor Ajay Devgn, who portrays a politician in his upcoming politcal saga Satyagraha - Demorcacy Under Fire, says, "I don’t foresee myself entering politics any time soon. Nor will I favour or support any political party."
item.itunes:subtitle: Actor Ajay Devgn, who portrays a politician in his upcoming politcal saga Satyagraha - Demorcacy Under Fire, says, "I don’t foresee myself entering politics any time soon. Nor will I favour or support any political party."

item.title: I-don-t-cast-anyone-keeping-in-mind-their-star-value-Karan-Johar
item.description: He is known for making glamorous multi-starrers and designer family dramas, but filmmaker Karan Johar insists that he does not cast anyone keeping in mind their star value.
item.itunes:subtitle: He is known for making glamorous multi-starrers and designer family dramas, but filmmaker Karan Johar insists that he does not cast anyone keeping in mind their star value.

item.title: Movie-making-is-like-playing-Russian-roulette-Mahesh-Bhatt
item.description: Director-producer Mahesh Bhatt compares movie-making to playing Russian roulette with three bullets, where there are more chances of getting shot than surviving.
item.itunes:subtitle: Director-producer Mahesh Bhatt compares movie-making to playing Russian roulette with three bullets, where there are more chances of getting shot than surviving.

item.title: KJo-a-very-good-dancer-Remo-D-Souza
item.description: Choreographer Remo D'Souza has certified filmmaker Karan Johar as a good dancer who can do some really professional spins.

item.title: Centenary-Film-Festival-to-be-launched-in-capital-April-25
item.description: Centenary Film Festival, a six-day extravaganza, will celebrate 100 years of Indian cinema in all its glory when it starts here April 25.

item.title: NGO-demands-ban-on-Ek-Thi-Daayan
item.description: FLAC, an NGO engaged in spreading awareness against the superstition of daayan (witch), has demanded ban on Emraan Hashmi's film Ek Thi Daayan claiming that the movie glorifies the superstition of witches.
item.itunes:subtitle: FLAC, an NGO engaged in spreading awareness against the superstition of daayan (witch), has demanded ban on Emraan Hashmi's film Ek Thi Daayan claiming that the movie glorifies the superstition of witches.

item.title: Anupama-Chopra-s-review-Ek-Thi-Daayan
item.description: Ek Thi Daayan had the potential to be an A-grade horror film but it’s an opportunity lost. However, I’m very curious about what debutant director Kannan Iyer will do next. Anupama Chopra writes.
item.itunes:subtitle: Ek Thi Daayan had the potential to be an A-grade horror film but it’s an opportunity lost. However, I’m very curious about what debutant director Kannan Iyer will do next. Anupama Chopra writes.

item.title: Ranbir-Katrina-Arshad-s-choice-for-on-screen-Ram-Sita
item.description: Actor Arshad Warsi feels Ranbir Kapoor and Katrina Kaif would be ideal to play Lord Ram and his wife Sita in a film on epic Ramayana.

item.title: Robert-Pattinson-joins-Maps-to-the-Stars
item.description: Twilight star Robert Pattinsonis set to work with director David Cronenberg again in Maps to the Stars, a follow-up from their 2012 film Cosmopolis.

item.title: Critics-report-Scary-Movie-5-worst-of-series-despite-big-stars
item.description: The latest installment of the Scary Movie franchise may have stars like Lindsay Lohan, Charlie Sheen and even Mike Tyson but it doesn't tickle the ribs of the critics, some of whom have even called it the worst of the franchise.

item.title: Critics-review-Ek-Thi-Daayan-is-a-blend-of-horror-psycho-thriller
item.description: Emraan, Kalki, Konkona and Huma have given their best performance. Ek Thi Daayan is a cult horror film, claim the makers. The critics, however, have given mixed reviews to the film. We bring you an insight.

item.title: Satyagraha-to-be-screened-in-South-Africa

item.title: Cheesy-colloquial-flavour-in-B-wood-film-titles
item.description: Sample these: Revolver Rani, Rajkumar Rambo, Fukrey and Kuku Mathur Ki Jhand Ho Gayi. Creative and colloquial Bollywood film titles are keeping movie audiences, especially the masses, as intrigued as filmmakers want them to be.
